name: The Mariachi Loco
description:
Battle it out in a free for all colorful fiesta of instruments! Celebrate the dead in style in this Folklore-filled third person shooter that can be played with up to 8 players!

You can't kill the dead. But you can certainly have fun trying! 

Download Hamachi to host your own matches across the globe! Download Hamachi here: https://hamachi.uptodown.com/windows/descargar

Controls:

Gamepad, Mouse+Keyboard support!

Minnimum specs:

This ran on a low end 2012 laptop with a 3rd gen  intel I5 CPU at 40+ fps. If you can run Minecraft, you can run tis game no problem. 

Note: Some player's animations might run at a different framerate if the connection is unstable. 

Made by a proud team of 5:

*Diego Bribiesca

 (Coding, Network, Particles, UI, UX and additional assets) 

*Alejandro Dulché (Me) 

(Characters, illumination & visuals, Enviornment, UI and additional assets) 

*Darian Verduzco 

(Animation, Weapons, additional assets) 

*Bruno

(Additional coding, level design, game design) 

*Agustín "Pancholín" 

(Music, Sfx, Voice acting) 

Developed entirely over a 3 week period. Used a few premade assets for the enviornment. Every other game asset was made from scratch, including characters. We died making this. But some things are worth dying for!

Enjoy! :)
